content.en: Adaptive Mesh Refinement: Researchers are exploring ways to improve strain energy based techniques for adaptive mesh refinements, and one algorithm incorporates advantages from different finite element methods and mesh generation methods. Another algorithm applies a solution algorithm based on the general finite element method to a linear diffusion-convection-reaction problem in space-time, using weakly enforced boundary and initial conditions. Additionally, algorithms are being developed to solve various equations, such as the time dependent Navier-Stokes equations for fluid flows and multidimensional convection-diffusion equations, using finite element methods and implicit algorithms.
content.da: Adaptiv Mesh Refinement: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre strain energy-baserede teknikker til adaptive mesh refinements, og en algoritme inkorporerer fordele fra forskellige finit element metoder og mesh generation metoder. En anden algoritme anvender en løsningsalgoritme baseret på den generelle finit element metode til et lineært diffusion-konvektion-reaktions problem i rum-tid, med svagt håndhævede rand- og begyndelsesbetingelser. Derudover udvikles algoritmer til at løse forskellige ligninger, såsom Navier-Stokes ligninger med tidsafhængighed for væskestrømme og multidimensionelle konvektion-diffusion ligninger, ved brug af finit element metoder og implicitte algoritmer.
